title: 30 Of Amazon’s Best Summer Dresses For Every Occasion
description: With the days getting warmer and the deals getting bigger (hello, Prime Day), we can’t help but get into the summer — and shopping — spirit. As we look at our calendars stacked with barbecues, girls' nights out, vacations, and weddings, we’re both excited and overwhelmed by all the outfits we need to put together. Fortunately, Amazon (not-so-surprisingly) has a great selection of stylish swimsuits, comfy travel outfits, and even wedding guest dresses — making it easy to do all our shopping in one place.Looking for a summer dress on Amazon can feel daunting thanks to the sheer number of options, so we did the hard work for you. We scoured the retailer’s luxury shops (like Saks and Shopbop), reader-favorite brands (like Good American and Show Me Your Mumu), and top-rated finds. The result? A curated roundup of the best sundresses, vacation styles, and wedding guest looks — plus plenty of minis and maxis — for every warm-weather occasion, from work happy hours to graduation parties.Click through to shop 30 of our favorite Amazon dresses to refresh your summer wardrobe.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Best Amazon SundressesThe easiest one-and-done summer outfit? A sundress. And Amazon has plenty of standout styles to choose from. Think trendy milkmaid silhouettes, tie-front bodices, and billowing skirts — all with an effortlessly whimsical feel that’s perfect for brunches, backyard barbecues, and birthday dinners. We’re especially loving breezy linen styles and bold floral prints this season.MakeMeChic Boho Floral Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonHuhot Halter Neck Floral Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Essentials Empire Waisted Cotton Sateen Tiered Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonGanni Tie-Front Cotton Midi-Dress, $, available at AmazonGrace Karin Floral Square Neck Swing Dress, $, available at AmazonShy Velvet Contrast Linen Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Vacation Dresses Whether you’re jetting off to the tropics, heading to Europe, or planning a staycation, your vacation wardrobe deserves a refresh. From netted and crocheted fabrics to vibrant colorways and graphic stripes, Amazon has no shortage of dreamy, destination-ready dresses.Rails Tamara Dress, $, available at AmazonSweatyRocks Floral Print Cut Out Sleeveless Halter Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonZesica Sleeveless Striped Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonSignificant Other Oakleigh Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonAmanda Uprichard Dianella Dress, $, available at Amazonendless rose Off Shoulder Sleeveless Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Wedding Guest DressesIf your calendar is stacked with engagement parties and weddings this summer, don’t sleep on Amazon for special occasion dresses. Whether the dress code is black tie, cocktail, or casual destination, there’s a wide range of standout options. Consider an on-trend halter neckline or a vibrant puff-sleeve mini for a playful look. Dainty lace details and detachable scarves are also styles you’ll reach for again and again.Sabina Musayev Nicola Dress, $, available at AmazonCity Chic Carla Dress, $, available at AmazonNIA Zaza Dress, $, available at AmazonMISHA Lilia Gown, $, available at AmazonTrina Turk Pleated A-Line Dress, $, available at AmazonBardot Adoni Mesh Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Mini DressesWarmer weather calls for skin-baring looks — and a mini dress is a must. We found styles perfect for everyday wear, vacations, wedding events, and even the office (hello, button-down swing silhouettes). We’re especially eyeing picnic-ready, fruit-print styles and preppy tennis dresses. Pair them with raffia accessories and your favorite retro sneakers for an effortlessly summery feel.Dsewpaur Short Sleeve Swing Tunic Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonBeach Riot Bria Dress, $, available at AmazonCider Fruit Pattern A Line Sundress, $, available at AmazonShow Me Your Mumu Bradshaw Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonCHICGAL Strapless Boho Floral Print Sundress, $, available at AmazonFloerns Ruffle Hem A Line Short Dress, $, available at AmazonAmazon Maxi DressesEasy, breezy, and versatile, a maxi dress is a summer staple. Amazon is your one-stop shop for fresh options, from breathable linens to stretchy satins in nautical stripes and sunset hues — style them with Fisherman sandals or thong kitten heels for different vibes.Madison The Label Tamika Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonThe Drop Linen Button-Front V-Neck Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonCupshe Floral Print Twisted V Neck Sleeveless Long Dress, $, available at AmazonGood American Satin Slip Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonChouyatou Smocked Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonLioness Field of Dreams Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonBest Amazon SundressesThe easiest one-and-done summer outfit? A sundress. And Amazon has plenty of standout styles to choose from. Think trendy milkmaid silhouettes, tie-front bodices, and tiered maxi skirts — all with an effortlessly whimsical feel, perfect for brunches, backyard barbecues, and birthday dinners. We’re especially loving bold floral prints, nautical seersucker stripes, and picnic-ready gingham this season. Line and Dot Junie Corset Dress, $, available at AmazonWayf Dana Smocked Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonMadewell Smocked Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, $, available at AmazonResa Anna Midi Dress, $, available at Amazon4th and Reckless Melinie Dress, $, available at AmazonFree People Cecil Mini Dress, $, available at AmazonMisa Maxine Dress, $, available at AmazonStaud Cabo Linen Dress, $, available at AmazonThe Drop Luna Scoop Neck Linen Maxi Dress, $, available at AmazonLike what you see? author: Amanda Randone

title: 42 Summer Fashion Finds From Nordstrom’s Sale Section
description: Summer dressing hits different — breezy dresses, crisp white tops, and nautical-inspired staples from poplin button-downs to boat shoes (à la the trending fisherman aesthetic) are simply everything. Add in this season’s sandal lineup (Flip-flops! Slides! Kitten heels!) and a color palette spanning butter yellow to powder pink — plus cheery prints like polka dots and stripes — and it’s officially time to refresh the rotation. Luckily, Nordstrom’s Anniversary sale is running from July 12 through August 3 (with Nordy Club members getting early access on July 8), just in time to revamp your summer wardrobe and get you excited about fall. As a fashion editor, I’m always combing through it for the best finds — timeless staples, trend-forward styles, and everything in between. Right now, I’m stocking up on the kind of pieces that make summer dressing feel easy: cute dress-and-sneaker combos, playful bubble hems, airy raffia accessories, fun sunglasses, and standout swim. And yes, I’m still making room for loungewear — just the kind that can handle a heat wave and feel perfectly effortless during summer travel. Plus summer wedding guest dresses, breezy matching sets, and Cowboy Cartner-ready extras.  Click through for 42 of the best summer-ready finds from Nordstrom’s sale — all editor-approved and all worth scooping up before they’re gone.All linked products are independently selected by our editors. author: Fashionista

title: Jess Cartner-Morley on fashion: So long, sequin kaftan! The holiday wardrobe is all about sleek, muted neutrals
description: The vacation aesthetic is now altogether more low-key. Take a deep breath and put those fringed palazzo pants downDoes your kaftan have a sequin trim? Adorable! Does your holiday tote bag have a shell bag charm? Cute. Does your maxidress have pom-poms dangling from it? Um, OK, I’m sure it’s lovely, but let’s take a moment here, shall we? Are you completely sure you need to coordinate your beach jellies with your candy-striped shorts and cropped top? Look, I’m going to come out and ask the question here. Have our holiday wardrobes got a bit … overexcited?I don’t want to be a killjoy. But there is a fine line between a cheerful holiday aesthetic and looking as though you bought the entire contents of your suitcase while on a sangria-fuelled shopping spree at Gatwick. Beguiling though all this stuff is, there is a point where tomato-print sundresses and sandals with ric-rac lacing stop looking delightfully Dolce, and start looking a tiny bit overwrought. Take a deep breath and put those fringed palazzo pants down. Continue reading...
author: Jess Cartner-Morley

title: Demna bows out at Balenciaga with star-studded final show in Paris
description: At times controversial fashion designer used show as study for ‘La Bourgeoisie’ before move to Gucci in MilanKim Kardashian modelling an off-shoulder fake mink coat inspired by Elizabeth Taylor. Nicole Kidman and Kyle MacLachlan nattering on the front row. And an appearance from Mrs Bezos herself.The stars were always going to align in Paris for Demna’s final show at Balenciaga. And on Wednesday lunchtime, the most controversial and copied designer in modern fashion bowed out after a decade with a show that conformed to the idea of couture as much as it challenged it. Continue reading...

title: 26 Editor-Loved Amazon Prime Day 2025 Fashion Deals, Like Kendall Jenner's $9 Tank
description: Fashion connoisseurs, rejoice. Amazon Prime Day is officially here. From now through July 11, shoppers can take advantage of some of the year's biggest deals - including markdowns on bestselling styles like handbags, leggings, everyday sneakers, and more. As shopping experts, we're essentially always tuned into Amazon's best deals and markdowns - from savings on cult-favorite beauty products to price drops on Amazon's most coveted home essentials and discounts on top-rated wellness products. And of course, we sorted through hundreds of Amazon Prime Day fashion deals to curate the best and help you better sort through all the madness, including Kendall Jenner's favorite Hanes tank top and the best jeans from Levi's. FYI: these fashion deals are going fast, so you'll want to keep your credit card handy and act quickly. Our Favorite Amazon Prime Day Fashion Deals to Shop A set of gold bracelets that don't rust for under $10: Salircon 3-Piece Chunky Gold Cuff Bracelets at $8, originally $10 Kendall Jenner's favorite tank top: Hanes Ecosmart Cotton Tank at $9, originally $11 An editor-approved bestselling necklace: Kendra Scott Elisa Pendant Necklace at $50, originally $70 The perfect pair of hoop earrings: Ana Luisa Double Hoop Earrings at $68, originally $85 Get almost 50 percent off Bella Hadid's favorite designer bag: Coach Suede Brooklyn Shoulder Bag 39 at $282, originally $495 Keep scrolling to shop our top Prime Day sale picks, and be sure to sign up for Amazon Prime so that you don't miss a moment of the action. Looking for more deals? Check out PS's editor-curated Prime Day sale picks and subscribe to our newsletter for more shopping recommendations. Update on July 10, 2025 at 5:30 PM ET: Updated prices and checked stock for all products.
author: Naomi Parris

title: 15 Fashion Bestsellers From Nordstrom Our Editors Suggest Grabbing ASAP
description: As shopping editors, we know all the best secrets for navigating Nordstrom's site to find standout styles (and even better deals). It's our job to uncover top-rated products, and Nordstrom certainly doesn't disappoint. Right now is a great time to score some of the brand's most popular pieces at prices you'll love - especially the ones on sale. If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you - because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for? Nordstrom recently released tons of new products under $50 to the sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish dresses and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm - even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics. Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.
